attributes.action: scrap the road fund licence and place the lost revenue onto fuel duty at the pumps.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am fed up with the number of road users escaping paying the Road Tax. To combat this I propose to scrap road tax and replace the lost revenue with a small increase on fuel duty at the pumps. This would stop road tax dodging. It would need a minimal increase at the pumps.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
